website_summaries.verdict: Attractive contemporary design means oven to table presentation possible. We like hard anodized aluminum as a base for nonstick cookware, and these pans are oven-safe to 450 degrees .
pros: Heavy aluminum construction and stay-cool stainless steel handles
cons: Some may find pieces too heavy
Dishwasher safe, but coating not dishwasher friendly, and can deteriorate over time

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control failed to control quality
customer_reviews.text: (this is the 8 piece set) Received them quickly (Thanks Amazon!) but the 10" pan and the 6qt pot both had defects in the nonstick coating. I've used and loved Calphalon cookware before, and I don't understand how these obvious factory flaws made it into a box and into my home.
customer_reviews.author: gamer

customer_reviews.title: Teflon Coating not durable
customer_reviews.text: We have discovered after 2.5 years of use the coating on just our pots are wearing off. We use only wooden spoons and on rare occasion we might use a metal tong or whisk when needed. Very disappointed after this time that we need to replace the pots. They get used daily and we had anticipated they would last much longer considering the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Cronin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After using the cookware for almost 7 months I have to change my review. I use only plastic utensils and the coating is now dented and scratched. The coating also leaves black on the drying towel. The pans do not hold up to high heat for stir fry. I'm really disappointed since I've been searching for durable cookware for 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: MJP

customer_reviews.title: These pots scratch easily..
customer_reviews.text: These pots scratch easily... On the BOTTOM of the pot, not even on the inside from the wrong utinsels... Also, don't even think about accidentally putting them in the dishwasher. They come out clouded and chalky looking... Plus the dark gray finish comes off on the towels you use to dry the outside of the pot. Not my favorite set I've ever had... And I've only had them for 2 months! Side note: if you accidentally put them in the dishwasher and they get chalky on the outside, some Barkeeper's Friend cleaner will take it off with some scrubbing. You can find it here on at Home Depot in the cleaners aisle.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Burn marks and discoloration - after 2 uses!
customer_reviews.text: Off to a bad start. I have already had to engage the customer service team at Calphalon. After only 2 uses of my 10" frying pan, there is extreme discoloration of the bottom of the pan, as well as burn marks on the rivets/screws and the neck of the handle that touches the pan. I am not happy. I am being told to buy all this special cleaning stuff to remove the burns marks and the stains but I was hoping it would be a long time from now that I had to worry about this.
customer_reviews.author: Barney M. Gallassio

customer_reviews.title: If you’re looking for the perfect set of pots and pans these are them
customer_reviews.text: Live these as much if not more than my old sel of all clad. The lids have steam escape holes if you want to use them and I live them very easy to clean and fit right in with my black granite counters stove top and cherry wood kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Diana2dogs Painter

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of disappointed with this set. It just doesn’t seem to be the quality I have come to expect from caphalon. That said it wasn’t terribly expensive and is clearly their flagship line, so I’ll hang on to it for year or so and buy Allclad next go around.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Nye

customer_reviews.title: coating chipping after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: No one should pay this kind of money for the product to be peeling/chipping after 2 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: As advertised--great Calphalon
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Calphalon pan a couple years ago and it became my favorite--still is completely non-stick and heats wonderfully. To celebrate a kitchen renovation with new stove, I bought this set, despite wondering if the quality fit the reasonable price. Well, having cooked on them many times now, I can say with some confidence these are top-notch. Will they last as long as my old pan? Who knows--but these are solid, heat well, clean up by hand nicely, and certainly are high-temp oven ready. Completely satisfied so far.
customer_reviews.author: V. Alan White

customer_reviews.title: Not non stick
customer_reviews.text: I love Calphalon products HOWEVER, not a fan of this set. The medium sized pan in this set we have only used 3 times. They have always been hand washed with a soft sponge and mild soap. Yesterday i pulled out the medium sized pan to cook some eggs and guess what, they stuck to the pan like it was a stainless one. In fact almost all but 1 stuff sticks to them. Always use wooden or silicone tools when cooking as well. Not happy at all wishing i would of bought the stainless set instead.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Lids need work
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, I have to say, I never actually used this set. After the initial washing (handwash only)before my first use I noticed water(a lot of it) had seeped into the cavity between the steel rim and the glass on the underside of the lids. There is a cavity there that allows water and presumably food to accumulate. Unfortunately, there is no way to clean or dry this area. That's a deal killer for me, I packaged them back up and sent them back. I like the looks of the set but I don't recommend them due to what these lids can become after collecting water and food for a while. Do yourself a favor and pass on these.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Stallings

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Set
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely excited to get this set. The middle size pan however came in damaged, the holes are so deep that it looks like production malfunction. Very disappointing and very inconvenient to start the process of returning the product. Don’t waist your hard earned money.
customer_reviews.author: Gui and Nat Dos Santos

customer_reviews.title: But another brand
customer_reviews.text: I use either plastic or wooden utensils but yet every pan in this set has scratches in it & from light use of a retired couple. They are JUNK! I will be buying new ones & have decided to buy All Clad Brand that are made in the USA instead of this junk from China!
customer_reviews.author: jilliebean

customer_reviews.title: best pots ever
customer_reviews.text: best pots ever, and cheaper than from Calphalon directly. Yes, there was some shipping damage that only affects the vanity of the item (external scratches and a few very small dings), but the functionality of the pans is absolutely perfect. Most of the negative reviews I'm reading seem to deal with people complaining about the scratching and overtime damage. If you approach these pans with respect - no metal utensils, handwashing WITHOUT steel wool, and using basic non-stick care methods they will last you a while. I've had my set over a year now and they are still nearly perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Atticus Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Pans are not well made
customer_reviews.text: The coating on these pans do not last making these pans not durable or safe. The coating on these pans can seep into your food and be cancerous. It gets on your hands and makes them grey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We've only been using the set for a couple of weeks but so far both my husband and I are very pleased. Arrived well packaged with no imperfections
customer_reviews.text: I was actually only looking to replace a couple of pots but couldn't pass up the value of this set. With the discounted price and coupon, I got the whole set for not much more than the pots alone would have cost. We've only been using the set for a couple of weeks but so far both my husband and I are very pleased. Arrived well packaged with no imperfections. Heats well, cooks evenly, cleans up easily. Time will tell how it will hold up, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: PeaceSeeker

customer_reviews.title: Great pots and pans set
customer_reviews.text: These pots and pans are great for cooking because of even heating and I never burn any food anymore. Frying turkey bacon and eggs is very easy and nothing sticks to the frying pan even melted cheese. I only wash them by hand, not the dishwasher, but they are easy to clean using a sponge and mild dish soap.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn Derman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The cookware itself is great, but the handles get too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Colin R. Landen

customer_reviews.title: What are these made of?!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive these and carefully removed all from the box, aware of a rather noxious odor. I hand washed and dried each piece and the odor remained. It was such a strong, toxic smell there is no way I would ever feel safe cooking with these. I was disappointed, but thankful for the ease of return. No idea if this was a one-off or is the way all are.
customer_reviews.author: ~Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Too hot t0 handle
customer_reviews.text: This must be the lesser cousin of the Calphalan I'm used to. Item arrived with scratches on the exterior forgivable Burning my hand on the" heat" resistant NOT! handles was not forgivable. This happened with gloves on. The description is wrong on a primary safety issue and the set is extremely lightweight so cooking not balanced Woul have returned item but missed return cutoff by 5 days This should not be Amazon Choice and is a DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: audreymccrimon

customer_reviews.title: ENORMOUS waste of money; crap product
customer_reviews.text: Hot garbage, ENORMOUS waste of money. They didn't last two years and we took care of them. The "non-stick" will deteriorate quickly, the pots themselves will warp with continued use, and the handles are cheap metal. I used these as long as possible to try and get my money's worth but it was pointless. Save your money; there isn't a single redeeming quality I can mention after owning them for nearly two years.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh M

customer_reviews.title: The Best Choice
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Calphalon cookware for nearly 15 years. Recently moved overseas so I had to depart my old set which did not have a single scratch in the teflon. So when I had to refurnish everything at my new location, you can bet Caphalon is my "go to". They will last you a very long time throughout your life. A great investment and smart choice on spending your money.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Hill

customer_reviews.title: love'em
customer_reviews.text: had'em for like 5 months already and they are in great shape still, just be carefull of not using any metal utensils with it, and I would recommend to wash them by hand
customer_reviews.author: Juan Sebastian Romero Benitez

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: The pans are great. No issue with any sticking. I had one of the small frying pans and loved it. When I needed more pans, I bought the whole set. Definitely great pans for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kayaker MIC

customer_reviews.title: Defective?
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand of pots so I ordered the set. It arrived fast. Although the large pot leaks out where the screws are.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all
customer_reviews.text: Bought these pots and pans with excitement as we were finally upgrading from wedding gift CuisineArt after 10 years. I was extremely disappointed to see that after ONE use of making mac & cheese with a wooden spoon and then handwashing that the nonstick coating is already coming off from the 2.5 qt pot. WTF?? I send a message with these pictures to Calphalon directly through their Facebook page and got no response. Nice. I need this fixed by them or else I'll go with something else that isn't a waster of $200.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: So far I love the set but worry about the durability.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this set very long and already the finish seems to be coming off my frequently used pan. I'm worried these pans will not last and I'm also a bit concerned that the finish is coming off in my food? If I knew this would happen so soon I might have looked for a different set. Pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: C. Proler

customer_reviews.title: Great set for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great set for a great price! The pots have strainers built into the lids which I love because it's eliminates the use of a strainer and another dirty dish to clean. Quality built and tough I can tell that these will last a long time. Wish I'd bought them sooner rather than wasting money on cheap cookware and having to replace items nearly every year.
customer_reviews.author: NateTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: I've only cooked with these pans a few times since receiving them, but so far so good. The nonstick coating works perfectly and makes the pans extremely easy to wash. They are a bit heavier than my other pans, especially when full so that can make it difficult to lift them to strain water out, etc. I didn't have any issues but it should be a consideration for others that may have problems. I love the weight though, makes them feel even more heavy duty!
customer_reviews.author: Amber C.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice to cook in, terrible durability. Outside of the posts are discolored after second wash in dishwasher. Also, nonstick finish is very easily damaged, even by just the posts sitting inside each other while being stored in the cabinet. It’s a bust. Not what you’d think you’d get with the Calphalon name.👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Garin Family

customer_reviews.title: Love the Lids with Optional Steaming; SO EASY TO CLEAN
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sizes of each product for all-around use. Lids on pots have steam vents on two sides, but if you want to keep the steam in (e.g. cooking rice), then you merely twist it so the vents are blocked. All products clean really well even with eggs, cheese or burnt food.
customer_reviews.author: trice01

customer_reviews.title: Nice set for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after a move to start with a new set an d through the old miss matched set out. Was not disappointed. Lids let you strain contents without a colander. Clean up easily and so far very non-stick. I do wash them by hand. The dishwasher has ruined the non-stick coating on other sets I have owned. I would recommend them
customer_reviews.author: CCRIDER

customer_reviews.title: Very slick
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my wife and she absolutely loves them. They are the slickest pans that she has ever used. They are very non-stick, and so much so that it can be a little challenging chasing the eggs around the pan to pick them up with a spatula. Because of the non-stick surface they are also very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I love this basic set, it is a little smaller in size for the different pots and pans than I expected, by a half inch or so to other brand sets I've owned but true to the listed dimensions. Very sturdy and super easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Calphalon 1943337 Classic Cookware
customer_reviews.text: Calphalon makes some great cookware and this set is a fine example of that. Food doesn’t stick and everything is easy to clean up. I own several pieces of their cookware and I am satisfied with all of them. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Randy225

customer_reviews.title: Peeling
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 10 piece pan set. I wash them by hand. I do not use metal on them at all. They are beginning to peel! Not even a year old and they are peeling! Then when I go to see about the warranty claim, I have to pay to ship the damn things to the company! I am utterly disgusted to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I only use soft utensils to cook with yet they scratch very easy and appear to be rusting in the scratches. Barely a year old. When you read Hard-anodized cookware one assumes it's pretty durable. Don't waste your money. There are many other purchase options. (5 Thumbs down).
customer_reviews.author: solidvoid

customer_reviews.title: Not very non stick
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this set a couple of weeks ago. I like the weight of the pans and straining lids. However, the skillets are so disappointing. They are not very non stick. When I scramble eggs in either of the two smaller ones , even using butter, I have to fill it with water, let it soak for a couple minutes and then scrape all the stuck on egg out of it with a rubber spatula. If you're looking for easy clean non stick pans, this is not the way to go. I wouldn't buy them again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: C. Uhlmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Not non-stick at all.
customer_reviews.text: Take a pass on these. They are very difficult to clean, not dishwasher safe. I ended up with the Calphalon ceramic and was much more impressed although they are also not dishwasher safe, but very non stick and easy to hand wash.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce J. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: do not put in dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: great pots, second set. first set was fine till wife put into dishwasher and rune finish
customer_reviews.author: Grabber

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: One of the skillets had scratches on bottom of pan and started sticking
customer_reviews.author: Robert Glidewell

customer_reviews.title: Great set at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Even cooking and very easy to clean. Straining lids on pots are super convenient. So durable I will not need to buy again but I would purchase again as a wedding, housewarming, or holiday gift.
customer_reviews.author: RatherBeFlying

customer_reviews.title: Great brand
customer_reviews.text: I have always used Calphalon. Very durable and owned for many years. Had to replace they are still good, but don’t feel as heavy and sturdy. Hope they last as long as the other sets.
customer_reviews.author: Hot_Tamale!

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and Substantial
customer_reviews.text: I really like these pots. Heavy duty with substantial lids, they work very well on our glass cooktop. Too new to answer any durability questions but they seem solidly made.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Washed them by hand in hot water and the coating on the outside is coming off!
customer_reviews.text: I know not to put the Calfalon pots in the dishwasher, so I washed them by hand in hot water. The outside coating is peeling off. I'm so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: donald j orth

customer_reviews.title: Love love love best pots and pans ever
customer_reviews.text: I love love love my new pots and pans. They are so easy to clean. Just one or two wipes with soap and water and done. This product is not dishwasher safe but I don’t have a dishwasher so I don’t mind.
customer_reviews.author: Anne-Marie Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: Product was as it was described. No complaints about product but 3 days after receiving this item, it was being sold $30.00 less than my purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Cookware
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled to find outstanding quality cookware at such a fabulous price! It is easy to use and clean up is a breeze. Amazon Prime delivery was quick.
customer_reviews.author: Storm

customer_reviews.title: Scratch easy
customer_reviews.text: Not durable considering the money you spend on them. The outsides scratch very easy and the finish does not last.
customer_reviews.author: Dezirae A McHone

customer_reviews.title: Value for the money
customer_reviews.text: We gave this set as a Christmas gift and we had one happy momma! This are great pans, easy to clean and quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Low Variety
customer_reviews.text: The cookware looks nice– almost rustic with the matte finish yet slightly elevated by the brushed steel handles. They’re super easy to clean. The directions are clear about what to do and what not to do (buy a wooden spoon, people). I enjoy cooking with these but I’m not a gourmet. I want to buy a few of the other pots in the collection... which brings me to my only grievance: the set lacks variety. It’s not a deal breaker but you’re essentially getting three pots in different sizes and two skillets. Still, they look good and they cook well.
customer_reviews.author: Gonpachiro

customer_reviews.title: The only pans I’ll ever need
customer_reviews.text: I love these pans. You can cook practically anything without sticking. I make an egg white frittata weekly and this pan cooks it in the oven then it slides right out
customer_reviews.author: Jarred Payne

customer_reviews.title: Feeling Fancy with my new cookware!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to update my kitchen. Worth every penny. The measuring in the pots, the easy pour and the non stick is great!!! The sizes are perfect and I love how fancy I feel cooking with them!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Gray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: as usual the calphalon pans are just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: These pots and pans are sturdy and work great! They're easy to clean and look good, too. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Carol G.

customer_reviews.title: Durability, work ability,
customer_reviews.text: Great price during Black Friday and cyber Monday. Great product, they look great on my new stove. I will never wash in a dishwasher rather take the time and hand wash but that’s just me thank you
customer_reviews.author: Richard Conklin

customer_reviews.title: Finally! Set of pots and pans that I enjoy using
customer_reviews.text: The heat Distribution on these pots and pans are excellent Calphalon quality. I like the fact that the lids are dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.author: GrandPa  G

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed after purchasing this set of Calphalon Classic Pots and Pans Set, 10-Piece Nonstick Cookware Set, Grey . The rim of the lids hold moisture and the pans are really hard to clean due to the design.
customer_reviews.author: Dissapointed Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Pans
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these pans already. They are so solid, tough and clean easy. Plus they're beautiful pans. Very happy w/ my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Scratch
customer_reviews.text: They easily scratch. I’m talking about the outside, while stored. A pan handle scratched a pot.
customer_reviews.author: Boots

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love these, even cooking, feels good in the hand. Easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They are nonstick and work really well. I use an oil spray anyway. Very easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Woodell

customer_reviews.title: Too soon to tell
customer_reviews.text: Too early to know how these pans will hold up over time. So far I love the functionality but I noticed the bottom of one of my pans already has several scratch marks even though it has only been used once on a brand new (and clean) flat top stove and they were washed by hand with a soft sponge - not a scrub pad. These scratches cannot be seen unless the pan is flipped over so for now I don't mind too much. So far they seem to heat quickly and evenly.
customer_reviews.author: DogMomma42

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but the handle gets really hot when using
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t seen the warranty card, but I believe the quality is pretty good. There is a slight metalic smell though. Tried once making pancakes, the small griddle heats up really fast. The problem is that the handle gets really hot as well, which fails it purpose completely. Poorly thermal-insulated
customer_reviews.author: S....K

customer_reviews.title: Non stick layer falls off after 1 1/2 months.
customer_reviews.text: Less than two months old and the nonstick is coming off one of the pans. I am outside of my Amazon return window. Don’t know what to do. I thought I was paying for a premium product. I didn’t expect them to fall apart so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: NikK

customer_reviews.title: Hot lid handles
customer_reviews.text: I had to give them a low review because I couldn't grab the lid while cooking without burning my hand. The metal handles on the lids are cool to look at, but are not cool to the touch when cooking.
customer_reviews.author: trish mig

customer_reviews.title: Heats evenly, good quality
customer_reviews.text: We love this set. Holding up good after 6 months. Heats evenly.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.text: I know my daughter will love this beautiful set of cookware...thank you for such fast service
customer_reviews.author: Sissy Louise

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Classic! I have missed a good set of pans! This is perfect for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn & Michael Call

customer_reviews.title: Yes, this set is great
customer_reviews.text: Love this set, easy to clean, cooks my food faster and the price was the best.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Monique

customer_reviews.title: Didn't hold up very well
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this set wanting a overall good set of pots and pans. We've had them barely a year and the coating is peeling off of several of the pans. Thought Calphalon was a good brand. Won't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell M.

customer_reviews.title: Water Stained
customer_reviews.text: After cooking one ear of corn in the large pot it is now water stained. Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: kimra lee mckinnon

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: I have had used this brand in the past, I really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Great set of cookware.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. As long as these are hand washed they should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Mac Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Great cookware.
customer_reviews.text: Great set, the 4 stars is just general that you have to be careful not to scratch the stuff up.
customer_reviews.author: Adam L

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean
customer_reviews.text: Great set. Best yet. They are so easy to clean and heat up fast.
customer_reviews.author: brook s.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband's apartment. It's a great set that includes everything you need to cook. Caphalon is high quality, worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best we've tried
customer_reviews.text: great cookware. someone finally got it right. lids fit great. meas. indicators on the inside. cool handles. YES
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Davis

customer_reviews.title: Didn't hold up
customer_reviews.text: This set was advertised with a "Lifetime Warranty". I'll see if they honor it. Performance of cookware pretty good but the finish on the exterior didn't hold up. We cook at home A LOT and thought this would be more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Christine E Federer

customer_reviews.title: These pans are great! Cook evenly and they have measuring marks on ...
customer_reviews.text: These pans are great! Cook evenly and they have measuring marks on the inside of each pot. My husband loves them.
customer_reviews.author: c. hillmann

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: These pans are awesome for cooking! Comes clean like a dream. Unfortunately if you look at them funny the get scratched. We’ve gotten rid of all metal utensils to cook with. Doesn’t matter! Scraaaaaastched
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My favorite thing is that the lids to the pots also act as a strainer! Saves a dish. These are very durable and nice looking too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift for anyone that likes to cook
customer_reviews.text: This cookware set was an excellent value considering there are much more expensive choices. This was a gift for my partner who loves to cook. He loves that they're easy to clean and he saids they heat evenly and nothing seems to stick to them.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Temperamental
customer_reviews.text: I love the looks of these pots and pans but not dishwasher safe and scratches easily.
customer_reviews.author: Flysafe90

customer_reviews.title: Durable and simple
customer_reviews.text: A great set. The handles get a little hot on a gas stove, but other than that they work really well.
customer_reviews.author: Ggregg

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: I'm following the care instruction verbatim, so far the set I purchased works well. I'm satisfied with the value I'm getting from owning them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cooking utensils, and who doesn't use/need that?
customer_reviews.text: Non stick, and easy to pour because they have pouring spouts. Nice lid(s). Made for a great gift because I can use it/them also
customer_reviews.author: Iowa Grandmother

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Looks great and cooks great. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rosebud_04

customer_reviews.title: Verry happy with these pans!
customer_reviews.text: After months of research and reading reviews I finally decided on these pots and pans and I’m so happy! Although they may scratch easily on the outside ( haven’t used anything to cook with becides my silicone utensils ) they are so worth it! So surprised at how quick liquids boil and love being able to drain from the lids even more !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Francis Swift-Morello

customer_reviews.title: Just buy this set and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Me and my wife are very pleased with these since we purchased them almost a year ago.

customer_reviews.title: Only the best!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new pans... These are the best. I found that it really makes a difference in cooking when you use better quality cookware. Everything tastes better.
customer_reviews.author: DD Gott - Donadees Corner

customer_reviews.title: Great pans. Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Great pans. Beautiful, well made, and great quality on the nonstick coating. Worth every penny! We will have these a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Last set I'll ever buy. I'm 68.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking if you're into industrial. Love the drainage capabilities of the perforated covers. Really like the riveted handles as opposed to the always loosening bolt on style of many other manufacturers. Cleanup is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Spankey the Spankster

customer_reviews.title: I burned my fingers
customer_reviews.text: I love Calphalon. The last set I bought did not have protections in the handles. I burned my finders.

customer_reviews.title: These pots and pans are the best!
customer_reviews.text: Love the lids!! Love the nonstick. Can’t believe I waited so long to get new pots and pans.

customer_reviews.text: Would definitely buy again. I wish I had splurged on the larger set.

customer_reviews.title: What,hand wash?
customer_reviews.text: Surprised to find out they are not dish washer safe, the only drawback.

customer_reviews.title: Non stick surface chips off
customer_reviews.text: In less than 4 months the non stick surface is peeling off. Pan has never been in dishwasher or cleaned with anything other than dish cloth. I would not purchase this item.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome 😂🥰

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: Outer sides are hard to clean. Stains won't come off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Calphalon Classic Pots And Pans Set, 10-Piece Nonstick Cookware Set, Grey
product_meta.description: Size:10-pcThe Calphalon Classic Nonstick 10 Piece Cookware Set features pots and pans with convenient fill lines, straining covers, and pour spouts that save time in the kitchen. This set helps eliminate the need to use or clean additional cookware such as measuring cups, strainers, or colanders. Pans are made with dual layer nonstick for extra easy food release and cleanup, and are constructed from durable hard anodized aluminum for fast and even heating. Long, cast stainless steel handles stay cool while cooking on the stove top and the entire nonstick cookware set is oven safe up to 450 degrees F, making it easy to finish recipes or keep food warm until it's served. The nonstick Calphalon cookware set includes an essential assortment of cookware for your kitchen so it’s ideal for everyday cooking.
feature_bullets: Dual layer nonstick for easy food release, and quick cleanup
Convenient measuring marks, pour spouts & straining lids
Durable hard anodized aluminum construction. 8-inch. Fry Pan. 10-inch. Fry Pan. 1.5-qt. Sauce Pan with Cover. 2.5-qt. Sauce Pan with Cover. 3-qt. Saute Pan with Cover. 6-qt. Stock Pot with Cover
Cast stay cool stainless steel long handles
